parameters.name: Cause
parameters.description: The reason for stopping the execution. The value must be 1 to 4,096 characters in length.

parameters.name: Error
parameters.description: The error code for stopping the execution. The error code must be 1 to 128 characters in length.

parameters.name: ExecutionName
parameters.description: The name of the execution to be stopped. You can call the **ListExecutions** operation to obtain the value of this parameter.

parameters.name: FlowName
parameters.description: The name of the workflow to be stopped. You can call the **ListFlows** operation to obtain the value of this parameter.
